title: 13 Investigates: Fountain finance director reviews City of Florence financial issues - KRDO
content: 13 Investigates: Fountain finance director reviews City of Florence financial issues  KRDO
description: FLORENCE, Colo. (KRDO) -- The City of Fountain's finance director went to Florence City Hall this week to help review financial concerns, according to Fountain City Manager Scott Trainor. Trainor said the Fountain Finance director was there on Wednesday to provide another set of eyes on whatever policies or issues the City of Florence wanted
